1.png.description: The green pot plant is visible on the table, slightly off-center but mostly in the middle of the frame. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it in view.

2.png.description: The green pot plant is visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

3.png.description: The green pot plant is clearly visible and centered in the image, but it does not yet occupy enough of the frame to indicate that the drone is extremely close. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

4.png.description: The green pot plant is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with clear texture and depth details. No further movement is necessary.
